description: ff. 35. 180 x 134; 130 x 90 mm. 15 lin. autograph (according to note on title page). 15th cen. Sakhāwī, al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ (1353-55 H.), VII, 260, lin. 20; Ṭalas, al-Kashshāf, 3231(1) - title in the colophon: al-Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-athar; the author completed his work 19 Shaʻbān 856. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى نزل احسن الحدىث ... وبعد فان اعظم العلوم
author: Kāfiyajī, Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān, d. 1474
title: al-Mukhtaṣar fī qawāʻid ʻilm al-ḥadīth wa-al-athar
creator: Kāfiyajī, Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān, d. 1474
subject: Hadith—Terminology—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
